Test Name: Kappa and Lambda Light Chain mRNA, In Situ Hybridization (ISH)
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or snap-frozen tissue sections
Purpose: To localize and visualize kappa and lambda light chain mRNA within tissue sections for clinical diagnostic evaluation.
Container: Glass slides prepared from FFPE blocks or cryosections
Equipment: Microscope, bench-top microtome, thermal cycler, hybridization chamber, automated stainer (optional)
